cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid value 'maybe' will cause configuration parsing error and prevent proper security setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting physCellId to 1007 exceeds the valid range (0-1006), causing cell identification failure and network initialization issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 physCellId 設定為 1007 超過有效範圍 (0-1006)，會導致小區識別失敗和網路初始化問題。
